articles.content:
Geneva (AFP)
While other countries gear up for rapid roll-outs of Covid-19 vaccines, Switzerland is staking out a slower path, prizing caution over speed, according to a leading vaccine expert.

articles.title: Why Black Americans don’t trust a coronavirus vaccine - WTOP
articles.description: Only 14% of African Americans say they trust the safety of a coronavirus vaccine, according to a recent study by the COVID Collaborative.
articles.content:
